channel.title: Monitoring on Dimitri Fontaine, PostgreSQL Expert

item.title: pgbouncer munin plugin
item.description: It seems that if you search for a munin plugin for pgbouncer it’s easy enough to reach an old page of mine with an old version of my plugin, and a broken link. Let’s remedy that by publishing here the newer version of the plugin. To be honest, I though it already made its way into the official munin 1.4 set of plugins, but I’ve not been following closely enough.
